name: of all things evil
description:
Do you have what it takes to discover the root ...
of all things evil?

This is short, dreadful, puzzle-adjacent exploration game.

Headphones and dark, quiet environment are recommended.

Made with love for Global Game Jam 2023, Edmonton, Alberta

Credits

Mike Guthrie-Plouffe
Art, Design, Audio, Programming

External Links

https://grenchorne.itch.io/of-all-things-evil

https://globalgamejam.org/users/yegmgp/games

Stuff I used
  • Tools & Technology: Github, Unity, Blender, Ableton Live Lite, Fmod, Photoshop, Illustrator
  • Resources: Open Game Art
  • Plugins: Character Movement Fundamentals, Sirenix Odin Inspector, PSXEffects
